component.name: Sharper Integration
component.summary: Sharper Integration is an AppImage desktop integration program

description.p: Sharper Integration is an AppImage desktop integration program. Its features include:

ul.li: Extracts and integrates the desktop icon and desktop file from the AppImage and integrates them with the desktop.
Registers App Images with their associated mime-types.
Upon installation of itself, associates itself with the AppImage mime-type.
Adds options to undo desktop integration and to update the AppImage from the menu (using AppImageUpdate or appimageupdatetool if present in the same directory as SharperIntegration).
